definition: game/wild animals and birds hunted for food or sport
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: When Esau left for the open country to hunt game and bring it back
sentences.chinese: 以扫往田野去打猎，要得野味带来。

sentences.english: Serve with red meat, chicken, duck, goose and game.
sentences.chinese: 适合搭配红肉，鸡，鸭，鹅，野味。

sentences.english: At room temperature with roast or grilled meats, game, poultry, pizzas and pastas.
sentences.chinese: 室温下搭配烤肉，野味，禽类，匹萨和意大利均可。

sentences.english: The Seapalahotel takes giving birth to the fierce seafood and venison as characteristic mainly.
sentences.chinese: 海上皇宫假日酒店主要以生猛海鲜及野味为特色。

sentences.english: There is still a meat trade of wildlife in the black market. Have you ever had any venison?
sentences.chinese: 黑市仍然有野味交易，你有品尝野味的经历吗？

sentences.english: There is still a meat trade of wildlife in the black market. Have you ever had any venison?
sentences.chinese: 黑市仍然有野味交易，你有品尝野味的经历吗？

sentences.english: My favourite wild food, of course, is the cep.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜爱的野味非牛肝菌莫属。

sentences.english: Perfect with beef, lamb, game and strong cheese.
sentences.chinese: 适宜搭配牛肉，小山羊肉，野味及口味重的奶酪。

sentences.english: Well suited to game, flavorful poultry or hearty casserole.
sentences.chinese: 适合搭配野味，味浓的禽类或沙锅菜。

sentences.english: With chicken dishes, red meats, game , and mildly seasoned pastas.
sentences.chinese: 搭配肌肉，红肉，野味，意大利面。

sentences.english: The food bank distributes the meat where it is needed.
sentences.chinese: 食品库再将这些野味分发至有需要的地方。

sentences.english: Please sit up and eat some of my game so that you may give me your blessing.
sentences.chinese: 请起来坐着，吃我的野味，好给我祝福。

sentences.english: The wild game marinated in milk for a day.
sentences.chinese: 这个野味在牛奶里泡了一天。

sentences.english: Enjoy with red meats, game and aged cheeses .
sentences.chinese: 适宜搭配红肉，各类野味及陈乳酪。

sentences.english: With red meats, whether grilled or with its sauce, as well as with game and soft cheeses.
sentences.chinese: 可与烤红肉，野味和淡淡的奶酪搭配。

sentences.english: ELEGANCE and unique GAMEY flavour certainly comes along.
sentences.chinese: 优雅及独特的野味混然一身。

definition: to have a large and sumptuous meal (traditionally on the 1st and 15th of each month)
a dish that goes well with alcoholic drinks
to eat (of bird or animal)/to feed
